alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Laclede (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 11:32PM CDT until July 13 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Dallas County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Laclede County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1132 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Urbana, or 13 miles north of Buffalo, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Bennett Spring State Park, Bennett Springs, Windyville, Leadmine, Tunas, Plad and Sleeper. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
